Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Reroute near Jackson/Hamlin
ShortDescription: 126 Jackson buses temp. rerouted near Jackson/Hamlin.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#126 Jackson buses temp. rerouted near Jackson/Hamlin.

Buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Jackson/Hamlin, due to street blockage near Jackson/Hamlin.

Eastbound buses will operate via Jackson, Pulaski, Harrison, Independence and Jackson including the normal route streets.

Westbound buses will operate via Congress, Pulaski and Jackson.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #94 California Temporary Northbound Reroute near Diversey/California
ShortDescription: NB 94 California buses are temporarily rerouted via  California, Fullerton, Western, Belmont and California: due to, street blockage near Diversey/California.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #94 California buses are temporarily rerouted via  California, Fullerton, Western, Belmont and California: due to, street blockage near Diversey/California.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
